departureFlight.from: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai

returnFlight.to: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai

localTransport.details: Arrange for a pre-booked taxi from the airport to your accommodation. Consider renting scooters for local travel.

activities.title: Arrival in Goa & Transfer to Arpora
activities.description: Arrive at Dabolim Airport (GOI). Meet your pre-booked taxi and transfer to Resort Rio in Arpora. Check in and freshen up.

activities.title: Lunch at Souza Lobo
activities.description: Enjoy a delicious Non-Veg Goan lunch at the iconic Souza Lobo Restaurant. Try their famous seafood dishes.

activities.title: Explore Calangute Beach
activities.description: Spend the afternoon exploring the famous Calangute Beach. Enjoy swimming or simply relax by the shore.

sustainableAlternative.title: Beach Clean-up
sustainableAlternative.description: Participate in a local beach clean-up drive to help preserve the marine environment.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces pollution and protects marine life.

activities.title: Dinner at Infantaria
activities.description: Enjoy a Goan dinner at Infantaria

activities.title: Visit Fort Aguada
activities.description: Explore the historic Fort Aguada, offering stunning views of the Arabian Sea.

activities.title: Lunch at Fisherman's Wharf
activities.description: Enjoy a delicious Non-Veg lunch at Fisherman's Wharf, known for its Goan and seafood specialties.

activities.title: Explore Panjim City
activities.description: Take a stroll through the charming streets of Panjim, visit the Immaculate Conception Church, and explore the Latin Quarter (Fontainhas).

sustainableAlternative.title: Walking Tour of Fontainhas
sustainableAlternative.description: Take a guided walking tour of Fontainhas to learn about its history and culture.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local guides and reduces reliance on motorized transport within the heritage area.

activities.title: Dinner at The Black Sheep Bistro
activities.description: Enjoy Dinner at The Black Sheep Bistro

activities.title: Visit Dudhsagar Falls
activities.description: Embark on a day trip to Dudhsagar Falls, one of India's tallest waterfalls. Enjoy the scenic jeep ride through the forest.

sustainableAlternative.title: Spice Plantation Tour
sustainableAlternative.description: Visit a local spice plantation and learn about the cultivation of various spices. Enjoy a traditional Goan lunch made with fresh ingredients.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local agriculture and reduces the environmental impact of long-distance travel to Dudhsagar.

activities.title: Lunch (Included in Dudhsagar trip or Spice Plantation)
activities.description: Lunch will be provided

activities.title: Return to Arpora
activities.description: Return to Arpora, relax at the resort

activities.title: Dinner at A Reverie
activities.description: Dinner at A Reverie

activities.title: Baga Beach
activities.description: Enjoy the Morning at Baga Beach

activities.title: Lunch at Britto's
activities.description: Enjoy lunch at Britto's

activities.title: Anjuna Flea Market
activities.description: Shopping at Anjuna Flea Market

sustainableAlternative.title: Shop at Local Handicraft Stores
sustainableAlternative.description: Visit stores that support local artisans

activities.title: Dinner at Curlies
activities.description: Have dinner at Curlies

activities.title: Relax at the Resort
activities.description: Spend the morning relaxing by the pool or enjoying the amenities at Resort Rio.

activities.title: Check Out
activities.description: Check out from Resort Rio.

activities.title: Lunch at Vinayak Family Restaurant
activities.description: Lunch at Vinayak Family Restaurant.

activities.title: Transfer to Airport
activities.description: Transfer to Airport

activities.title: Departure
activities.description: Departure from Goa
